Hi All,
I have a friend on my Ancient Peddler's list (Greek and Roman Coins) and 
he would like to have some help in this photo.

Kim

David B. Wilber wrote:

> Group:
>
> I'm hoping that someone on this list might be able to help me identify
> object.  It is no ancient, probably no older that WWII.  It is 46mm x
> 29mm oval metal disk with Japanese writing on both sides.  I not sure
> which side is the obverse or which way is up.  I've had it for 40 years
> and have never been able to satisfy my curiosity.  I even showed it to a
> Japanese tourist once and all he could tell me that it is a military
> script that is not taught anymore.  I've attached a copy to this e-mail.
>
> Thanks in advance,
>
> Dave Wilber
>  
>
